scripts.db:link: if [ -n "$SUPABASE_PROJECT_ID" ] && [ -n "$SUPABASE_DB_PASSWORD" ]; then npx supabase link --project-ref $SUPABASE_PROJECT_ID --password $SUPABASE_DB_PASSWORD --yes; fi
scripts.db:types: npm run db:link && npx supabase gen types typescript --linked --schema public > src/types/supabase.ts
scripts.ci:check-types: npm run db:types && git diff --exit-code src/types/supabase.ts
